mapper.select: select * from tpm_tendency where member_idx = #{member_idx} and project_idx is null

select a.* from (select project_idx, avg(tendency_e) as tendency_e, avg(tendency_i) as tendency_i, avg(tendency_s) as tendency_s, avg(tendency_n) as tendency_n, avg(tendency_t) as tendency_t, avg(tendency_f) as tendency_f, avg(tendency_j) as tendency_j, avg(tendency_p) as tendency_p from tpm_tendency where member_idx = #{member_idx} and project_idx is not null group by project_idx) a

select a.*, b.* from (select * from tpm_member where member_idx in( select member_idx from tpm_project_member where member_idx=#{member_idx})) a left join (select member_idx, avg(tendency_e) te, avg(tendency_i) ti, avg(tendency_s) ts, avg(tendency_n) tn, avg(tendency_t) tt, avg(tendency_f) tf, avg(tendency_j) tj, avg(tendency_p) tp from tpm_tendency group by member_idx) b on a.member_idx=b.member_idx;

select * from tpm_member where member_idx in (select member_idx from (select member_idx from tpm_project_member where project_idx=#{project_idx} and member_idx!=#{member_idx}) where member_idx not in (select member_idx from tpm_tendency where project_idx=#{project_idx} and appraiser_idx=#{member_idx}))
